p: It has long been tempting to speculate on the origin of non-defective avian sarcoma viruses, because they are unique among acutely oncogenic, oncogene-carrying retroviruses [ 81]. Even among all the RSV strains, they form a separate category. The passage histories of the major RSV strains, Bryan high-titer, Schmidt–Ruppin, Carr–Zilber and Prague strains of RSV, are not known and cannot be reconstructed. Was Peyton Rous’ original isolate replication-defective or non-defective? Figure 1 summarizes these two possible scenarios.
